availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis Castleman (Jefferson County, KY wealthy farmer)

body.p: Born in Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, son of David Castleman and Virginia H. Harrison. A wealthy Jefferson County, Kentucky farmer.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Lewis Castleman (1829-1905), Find A Grave Memorial # 100080941, Lexington Cemetery, Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=castleman&GSfn=lewis&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=100080941&df=all& (accessed 14 Aug 2017).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 199B.
